text: @JoeBiden Joe Biden did not write this, some twitter hack campaign worker did. Joe is suffering from cognitive decline,  thinking 150 million died in the US due to COVID19 . #JoeBidenHasDementia #JoeBidenHasDementia #JoeBidenHasDementia #JoeBidenHasDementia
